alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 2:56PM EST until March 07 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Northern Carroll, Southern Carroll and Southern Coos Counties. In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, Northern Oxford and Southern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts will be along the southeast slopes of the higher terrain, especially the White, Mahoosuc, and Bigelow ranges.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos
